column4: ﻿something went kind of wrong, how do i completely reset the kde 4 settings? (i'm on 3 now, because i changed some options, and kde4 shows only my mouse ...)
i read somewhere i just need to delete my .kde4 folder, to reset the settings, any idea where it's located?
The folks in the kubuntu channel should know how to get your KDE up and running again.
